properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v4 c1 v3 c1 v2 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ring'ana rio monene
nering'ana - rigiya. x2
(The word of God
(is a good word).
Torie ogosika
torigokere botambe. x2
(We give it respect, and
let's be joyful in it always).

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Neringana - rigiya.
(This word is good).
Neringana - rigiya.
Neringana - rigiya,
torigokere botambe. x2
(Let's be joyful in it always).

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ring'ana rio monene
nering'ana rio - morembe. x2
(The word of God
is peace).
Torie ogosika
torigokere botambe. x2
(We give it respect, and
let's be joyful in it always).

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ring'ana rio monene
nering'ana rio- bong'aini. x2
(The word of God
is wisdom).
Torie ogosika
torigokere botambe. x2
(We give it respect, and
let's be joyful in it always).

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ring'ana rio monene
nering'ana rio - bwanchani. x2
(The word of God
is love).
Torie ogosika torigokere botambe. x2
(We give it respect, and
let's be joyful in it always).
